ComicInfo.Summary:
Overview
The mystery of the plundered graves leads Hellboy to a million gallons of boiling human fat and the unnatural birth of the God of Science. In Gary Gianni's "Autopsy in B-Flat," St. George is buried alive alongside the stolen treasure of squidheaded pirates.
